episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Diantha
standing alone in a secluded forest.
Oh... [Name:PlayerNickname ].

Discovered me, have you? I was trying to practice
in secret.
Actually, a play will be coming to Pasio soon.
And I was practicing because I plan to audition.

(Surprisedly ask why, since she’s a
famous actress.)
Surprised? It’s normal in the acting world.
(Ask if she really has to audition.)

Absolutely! After all, it’s for a role I was keen on
challenging myself to play.

Of course, there are times I’m offered roles others
want me for.
But I also get parts through auditions.

No matter how famous you are or how illustrious
your career...

there are still times when an unknown newcomer
scoops up the lead role.

It’s a bit like being a Pokémon Trainer—competing
in a world of challenging battles!
Oh, that look on your face...
You get it! Was my example relatable?
That reminds me. Could I ask you a small favor?

If it’s all right with you, could you play my
scene partner?

I ask because I like how you can act natural
around anyone.

When partnered with someone who gets
nervous—or with another professional—it’s
difficult to practice.
So how about it?
Great! Thank you! In that case...
Could you join me on your next day off?
A few days later...

I’ll be playing the older sister, who the protagonist
looks up to.

Come to think of it, the main character is about the
same age as you.

And so, [Name:PlayerNickname ] enjoyed [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ]
day off with Diantha.
Hey! Let’s try over there next!
Huh? I left something behind?
You’re right! Thank you!

*chuckle* I may have let my excitement get the
better of me.

Maybe it’s because I’ve someone dependable like
you with me?
(Instinctively look away.)
Huh? What’s the matter?
(Stare intently at Diantha.)
What is it? Why are you staring at me like that?

Now then, let’s go! There’s lots more fun to be
had today!
Well then, that wraps up our acting practice!

Thank you for joining me. I understand the role
better now thanks to you!

I’m sure I’ll be able to make a strong showing at
the audition, too!
Oh, but that aside...
Today was fun, even besides the acting.

I think I may love the time I spend with you even
more than I thought.

Next time, I’d like to hang out as our real selves,
not just for acting practice.
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
Could you...join me again on your next day off?
